sentences.english: Dear Colleagues, It gives me great pleasure to co-chair the third round of the China-US Economic Dialogue together with Secretary Geithner.
sentences.chinese: 我很高兴与盖特纳财长共同主持第三轮中美经济对话。

sentences.english: Timothy Geithner, Treasury secretary, will be in Europe for talks all week.
sentences.chinese: 美国财长盖特纳下周都将会在欧洲参加会谈。

sentences.english: Therefore, Eurogroup proposed to the ECOFIN to approve the two countries' programmes.
sentences.chinese: 因此，欧元区财长提出建议，批准这两个国家的方案。

sentences.english: Yesterday Tim Geithner, the US treasury secretary, left little doubt about the scale of the economic crisis.
sentences.chinese: 昨天美国财长盖特纳表害死经济危机越演越烈。

sentences.english: It gives me great pleasure to co-chair the third round of the China-US Economic Dialogue together with Secretary Geithner.
sentences.chinese: 我很高兴与盖特纳财长共同主持第三轮中美经济对话。

definition: lower house of bicameral assembly/House of Representatives (USA)/Chamber of Deputies
Angela Merkel (1954-), German CDU politician, chancellor from 2005
Donald Trump (1946-), American business magnate, US president 2017-
member of the US House of Representatives
abbr. for 參議院|参议院[can1 yi4 yuan4], senate/upper chamber (of legislative assembly)
